answers.answer: Magnesium usually stops contractions, I was in the hospital last night and given magnesium to to stop preterm labor.
I'm on it for blood pressure and preeclampsia
I was on that too when I had my son. It made me so uncomfortable and really loopy. However, it is used to prevent seizures during birth so try and bear with it ..it'll be over soon!!! Congrats
Yeah. So not fun but hey baby girls gonna be here soon enough
I had that too. Made me hot and  extremely tired
Made me hot and extremely tired. Every time I got up I was sweating so much I felt like I peed the bed or something. It's horrible!

question: Ugh nobody tells you that the magnesium they give you makes you hot as hell!!!! It's so hot and they just started this medication for my blood pressure! Hopefully this induction goes quick
title: magnesium
